channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lockheed Martin affirms earnings outlook, but doesn’t include tariff impact
item.description: Lockheed beat profit expectations by a wide margin and said its $173 billion backlog represents more than two years’ worth of sales.

item.title: Northrop’s stock falls as B-21 bomber’s production costs jump, hurting profits
item.description: Defense contractor’s stock drops as profit and revenue fall short of analyst estimates.

item.title: What happens if your student loans are in default as debt collection restarts?
item.description: Borrowers in default could see their wages garnished or Social Security benefits seized. Here’s what you need to know.

item.description: eSelf, a startup that focuses on conversational AI agents, is partnering an educational group to bring private AI tutors to students.

item.title: The best time of day to own stocks is actually at night
item.description: In this profitable trading strategy, you buy at the market close and sell at the open.

item.title: A new, open source text-to-speech model called Dia has arrived to challenge ElevenLabs, OpenAI and more
item.description: With a focus on expressive quality, reproducibility, and open access, Dia adds a distinctive new voice to the landscape of text-to-speech.
